sections.heading: Creation of Department of Natural Resources and Environment; Transfer of Commission of Natural Resources From Department of Natural Resources to Department of Natural Resources and Environment by Type II Transfer; Renaming Commission of Natural Resources to Natural Resources Commission; Designation
sections.text: Creation of Department of Natural Resources and Environment; Transfer of Commission of Natural Resources From Department of Natural Resources to Department of Natural Resources and Environment by Type II Transfer; Renaming Commission of Natural Resources to Natural Resources Commission; Designation of Chairperson by Governor; Creation of Michigan Trails Advisory Council; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Department of Natural Resources to Department of Natural Resources and Environment by Type II Transfer; Abolishment of Department of Natural Resources; Transfer of Certain Committees, Commissions, Authorities, and Councils From Department of Natural Resources to Department of Natural Resources and Environment; Transfer of Certain Powers and Duties of the Department of Environmental Quality to Department of Natural Resources and Environment by Type II Transfer; Abolishment of Department of Environmental Quality; Transfer of Office of Great Lakes From Department of Environmental Quality to Department of Natural Resources and Environment by Type I Transfer; Transfer of Low-Level Radioactive Waste Authority, and Powers and Duties of Its Commissioner, From Department of Environmental Quality to Department of Natural Resources and Environment; Transfer of Site Review Board From Department of Environmental Quality to Department of Environmental Quality; Abolishment of Site Review Board; Transfer of Michigan Commission of Agriculture to Department of Agriculture by Type II Transfer; Appointment of Director of Department of Agriculture by Governor; Transfer of Agricultural Preservation Fund Board and Pesticide Advisory Committee to Department of Agriculture by Type III Transfer; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Office of Racing Commissioner From Department of Agriculture to Michigan Gaming Control Board; Membership of State Interagency Council on Spanish-Speaking Affairs.
